mapper.insert:
insert into test_application_form (id, report_date, rec_date, cs_name, report_num, application_name, application_address, report_title, same_as_applicant, other_name, other_address, contact, tel, fax, email, delivered_to, payer, invoice_title, sample_name, sample_quantity, sample_model, brand, lot_no, specification, supplier, po_num, buyer, manufacturer, exported_to, origin_country, language, report_format, report_type, agree_to_subcontract, service_type, sample_treatment, applicant_sig_cop, application_date, employee, customer, test_requirement, test_trade_id, copy_num, flex_obj) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{csName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sameAsApplicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreeToSubcontract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleTreatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantSigCop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testRequirement,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{testTradeId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{copyNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flexObj, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update test_application_form set report_date = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_date = #{recDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cs_name = #{csName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_num = same_as_applicant = #{sameAsApplicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_name = #{otherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_address = #{otherAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = mapper.select: select id, report_date, rec_date, cs_name, report_num, application_name, application_address, report_title, same_as_applicant, other_name, other_address, contact, tel, fax, email, delivered_to, payer, invoice_title, sample_name, sample_quantity, sample_model, brand, lot_no, specification, supplier, po_num, buyer, manufacturer, exported_to, origin_country, language, report_format, report_type, agree_to_subcontract, service_type, sample_treatment, applicant_sig_cop, application_date, employee, customer, test_requirement, test_trade_id, copy_num, flex_obj from test_application_form where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, report_date, rec_date, cs_name, report_num, application_name, application_address, report_title, same_as_applicant, other_name, other_address, contact, tel, fax, email, delivered_to, payer, invoice_title, sample_name, sample_quantity, sample_model, brand, lot_no, specification, supplier, po_num, buyer, manufacturer, exported_to, origin_country, language, report_format, report_type, agree_to_subcontract, service_type, sample_treatment, applicant_sig_cop, application_date, employee, customer, test_requirement, test_trade_id, copy_num, flex_obj from test_application_form

select id, report_date, rec_date, cs_name, report_num, application_name, application_address, report_title, same_as_applicant, other_name, other_address, contact, tel, fax, email, delivered_to, payer, invoice_title, sample_name, sample_quantity, sample_model, brand, lot_no, specification, supplier, po_num, buyer, manufacturer, exported_to, origin_country, language, report_format, report_type, agree_to_subcontract, service_type, sample_treatment, applicant_sig_cop, application_date, employee, customer, test_requirement, test_trade_id, copy_num, flex_obj from test_application_form where test_trade_id = #{testTradeId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select a.* from test_application_form a left join user_test_trade b on a.test_trade_id = b.test_trade_id left join user c on b.user_id = c.id where c.username = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
